package.name: eSim+.

dependencies.package: mobilesubstrate, preferenceloader, cy+model.iphone (>= 11.2), ru.rejail.libiarrays1 (>= 1.0.11), com.rpetrich.rocketbootstrap, com.opa334.ccsupport

package.shortDescription: Detailed settings for eSIM / iPhones with dual SIM cards.

descriptionlist.description:
Apple would have to provide an enhanced calling and text message menu for dual SIM phones as standard. Unfortunately, this has not happened. This tweak will correct the situation and allow: -Select the SIM on which you want to make a voice call -Select the SIM to which you want to send a text message -Experimental function to send SMS messages from the iMessages program Excellent tweak with many settings.
ATTENTION! Exclusively for devices supporting eSIM / SIM (iPhone XS, XS Max, XR, 11, 11PRO, 11PRO MAX)
